title: Claimant notice period
p1: It may help the tribunal if you can provide this detail. You will not be penalised for not providing it.
tableHeader: Notice period details provided in ET1
writtenContractLabel: Written contract with a notice period?

et3ResponseIsNoticeCorrect.label: Are the claimant’s notice period details correct?

et3ResponseCorrectNoticeDetails.label: What are the claimant’s correct notice details? (optional)
et3ResponseCorrectNoticeDetails.hint: For example, you may wish to clarify that the claimant was dismissed without notice or paid them a sum in lieu of notice.

et3ResponseCorrectNoticeDetails.tooLong: The claimant notice period entered must be less than 2500 characters
